block.p: VANDERWERFF-Atze. On August 20, 2000. Native of Amsterdam, Holland. Loving husband of Patricia (nee Lyon). Cherished father of Tamar. Dear brother of Jo, Dinie, Willemina, Jan and Wim. Also remembered as a beloved uncle and friend. Memorial gathering Wed. 5-7PM with a service to be held at 7PM at Riverdale-on-Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Ave, Bronx. In lieu of flowers donations to ''This Close For Cancer Research'', Research Square, 270 Amity Road, Box 3725, New Haven, CT. 06525, would be greatly appreciated.
